intro: Cryptolepis producta, commonly known as the African snake plant, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family and is characterized by its upright, lance-shaped leaves that are often ribbed and have a waxy texture. The plant produces small, white or yellowish flowers arranged in clusters, which are followed by small, spherical berries. It is adapted to grow in well-drained soils and can thrive in partial shade to full sun. Cryptolepis producta is also valued for its medicinal properties in traditional African medicine.
